snippet: In response to an essay advocating taking time off between high school and college, readers raised financial concerns, to which the author, the former admissions dean at Middlebury, has responded.

lead_paragraph: Over the holidays, readers flooded The Choice's mailbox with thoughtful comments and observations, including on the initial student postings to our first-person "Envelope, Please" series.

headline.main: From the Mail Bag: On Taking a Gap Year
